1.post_text: We’re really excited for the London 2012 Olympics! In case you haven’t already heard, we’ll be sending three children all the way to London to experience the Olympics firsthand. They’ll then share these experiences with the rest of Singapore online. The contest is open to children 6 to 12 years old. To take part, children (parents and guardians can help) can log on to www.championsofplay.com.sg to submit either a photo or video of themselves playing their favourite game or sport; accompanied by a write-up, in 100 words or less, on why they are a Champion of Play. Start getting your kids, nephews, nieces and cousins to take part now!

Hi all, we’ve been alerted to a fake Double Cheeseburger coupon being circulated. Please note that the coupon is NOT genuine and does not originate from McDonald’s. To help our customers identify genuine offers, all our promotions are posted on either our corporate website or our McDonald’s Singapore Facebook page. You can view our latest promotions at the following link: http://www.mcdonalds.com.sg/whatson_coupons.html

Thanks to our fans for bringing this to our attention!

18.post_text:
We have been alerted to a promotion on Facebook that claims it is giving out vouchers to customers who join the page. We’d like to highlight that this promotion does not originate from McDonald’s and is not affiliated with us in any way. To help our customers identify which offers are genuine, all our promotions are posted to either our corporate website or our McDonald’s Singapore Facebook page. You can also view our latest promotions at the following link: http://www.mcdonalds.com.sg/whatson_coupons.html
We are looking into this further to find out more.

24.post_text:
Dear Valued Customers,
 
We apologise for the recent unavailability of Curry Sauce in many of our stores. We know this is a condiment that many of you love, and sincerely regret any inconvenience this has caused you.
 
Our goal has always been to put the quality of our food and the satisfaction of our customers first. In regular product checks, we have noticed that a small number of samples from our most recent batch of Curry Sauce have had their packaging compromised. As a precaution, we have made the decision to withdraw the entire batch from circulation. Our BBQ and Sweet ‘N Sour sauce are unaffected and continue to be available. We are bringing in a new batch of Curry Sauce and will update once it is available in our stores.
 
We know many of you will be disappointed at this unfortunate situation, and we’d like to try and make it up to you in some small way. From 10 – 24 February 2012, any purchase of Chicken McNuggets at our restaurants will entitle you to a FREE treat with our compliments:
-              4pc: 1 Soft Serve Cone
-              6pc and 9 pc : 1 Apple Pie
-              20 pc: 2 Apple Pies
 
If you are a McDelivery customer, please retain your receipt and redeem the offer at any of our restaurants within 7 days of purchase. Please check with our restaurants or our McDelivery hotline for more details.
 
We want you to know that we will NEVER compromise on the quality and safety of the food we serve.
 
We hope you will enjoy these free treats with our compliments. We are grateful and humbled by the support you have shown us over the years and we hope to serve you even better in future.
 
Yours sincerely,
 
Judy Harman
Managing Director
McDonald’s Restaurants
